            "name": "Drools Absolute Calcium Syrup Dog Supplement (300ml)",
            "description": "Drools Absolute Calcium Dog Supplement Syrup is for all breeds of dogs. This Calcium and Phosphorus formula also helps in making teeth stronger. This Dog Supplement helps in eradicating the Calcium and Phosphorus deficiency in Dogs. Supports Healthy Joints-This Dog Supplement contains calcium that helps in supporting healthy joints.             "price": 150,

        {
            "_id": "64401544b4568f5abf5b831f",
            "name": "Spectrum Starter32 Kitten Food – Chicken Formula (400g)",
            "description": "SPECTRUM Kitten Starter32 An especially formulated complete and balanced ultra-premium food to meet the nutritional requirements of kittens (4 to 16 weeks of age) and queens during gestation and lactation.\n\nThe nutritional concept of SPECTRUM Kitten Starter32 is focused to counter stress, digestive sensitivity and the immune gap in kittens at weaning and during post weaning period.\n\nCOMPOSITION: Dehydrated chicken protein, chicken fat, rice,  maize, whey powder, hydrolysed bagasse fibre, dried antarctic krill (euphausia superba), hydrolysed chicken liver, brewer’s yeast, whole egg powder, yucca schidigera, L-carnitine, fructo-oligosaccharides (300ppm), rosmarinus sp.- curcuma sp.- vitis sp.- citrus sp.- eugenia sp. (300ppm).\n\nNUTRITIVE ADDITIONS: Lodine (E2): 1,5 mg/kg, Copperr (E4): 45 mg/kg, Manganese (E5): 20 mg/kg, Zinc (E6):180 mg/kg, Selenium (E8) 0,9 mg/kg Preservative – Antioxidant.\n\nFOR KITTEN ( AGED FROM 4 TO 16 WEEKS)\n\nDURING GESTATION AND LACTATION CATS\n",
            "price": 280,
            "category": "Cat",
            "inventory": 100
        },
        {
            "_id": "64401598b4568f5abf5b8320",
            "name": "Brit Care Kitten Pouch – Tender Turkey Fillets in Gravy (85g) ",
            "description": "The feline diet should be diverse, tasty, and, above all, healthy. Delicious Brit Care pouches serve both as complete food and as a yummy addition to dry food for extra variety and flavour. They’re especially suitable for very choosy cats or cats with problematic food intake. Thanks to added sea buckthorn and nasturtium, they help prevent urinary tract diseases.\n\nComposition: fillets with 85% meat (62% chicken, 15% liver, 8% turkey), broth, 1% sea buckthorn, 0,5% nasturtium, minerals, pea starch.\n\nAnalytical ingredients: crude protein 9.5%, crude fat 4.5%, crude fibers 0,5%, crude ash 2.0%, moisture 82.0%, calcium 0.25%, phosphorus 0.2%, sodium 0.3%.\n\nNutritional composition: vitamin D3 (E671) 280 I.U., vitamin E (3a700) 160 mg, biotin (3a880) 0.8 mg, zinc (3b606) 15 mg, manganese (3b502) 4 mg, iron (3b103) 12 mg, copper (3b405) 0.5 mg, iodine (3b201) 0.8 mg, taurine (3a370) 600 mg, L-methionine (3c305) 2 000 mg.\n\nMetabolizable energy: 840 kcal/kg.\n",
            "price": 120,
            "category": "Cat",
            "inventory": 100
        },
        {
            "_id": "64401638b4568f5abf5b8321",
            "name": "Brit Premium by Nature Cat Can – Chicken with Hearts (200g)",
            "description": "Cats are meat eaters by nature, but they also require variety, so the composition of their diet is very important. This delicious and easily digestible paté, ideal as a treat or topper for kibbles, is sure to please cats of all breeds and categories. Complete Food for Adult Cats.",
            "price": 190,
            "category": "Cat",
            "inventory": 100
        }
